newsitem.title: USA: United Dominion acquires Lunaire Ltd.
newsitem.headline: United Dominion acquires Lunaire Ltd.

text.p: United Dominion Industries Ltd said it has acquired Lunaire Ltd, a privately-held producer of heat process and environmental conditioning equipment.
Terms of the cash acquisition were not disclosed.
Lunaire has annual sales of about $20 million, United Dominion said.
United Dominion makes diversified engineered products such as heating and ventilation equipment and water boilers. It has about $2 billion in annual sales.
